WorkItem.Description:
With my current profile, Rawr is ranking Bold Cardinal Rubies and Bold Bloodstones (including Perfects) ahead of their Delicate counterparts, but at the Dragonseye and Scarlet Ruby levels, the order is reversed.  Relative stat values (as well as all other theorycrafting tools) indicate that agility should in fact always be ahead.  In the case of orange gems, strength versions are always favoured.
 
Here's the character profile.  Attached is an image export of the gem rankings, with the obviously different ones marked.
